items.title: A Sparkling Book Club Craft Idea: Book Bedazzling
items.description: Bedazzling book covers is a trendy way to decorate your books. Why not try it out as a book club craft idea? Here's a quick DIY guide!

items.title: A Love Letter to Country Queers
items.description: This collection of interviews, photographs, and ephemera is a love letter to the queer people living in rural U.S. communities.

items.title: The Best New Book Releases Out July 22, 2025
items.description: Here are some of the best new books out this week, what they are about, and why you should add them to your TBR!

items.title: I Want To Go To There: 5 Fabulous Fantasy Books with Magical Establishments
items.description: Escape from the world into these fantasy books with magical, healing establishments, including libraries, coffee shops, markets, and more.

items.title: What Gives Carla Hayden Hope, Plus More News For Library Workers
items.description: Former Librarian of Congress Carla Hayden shares what gives her hope. Plus, more library news, from book adaptations to censorship laws.
